pkgmetadata.longdescription: ====================rackspace-novaclient====================Metapackage to install python-novaclient and Rackspace extensionsInstall=======:: pip install rackspace-novaclientUsage=====This metapackage will ensure that python-novaclient and these extensionsare installed that are compatible with the Rackspace cloud:- rackspace-auth-openstack- os_diskconfig_python_novaclient_ext- rax_scheduled_images_python_novaclient_ext- os_networksv2_python_novaclient_ext- os_virtual_interfacesv2_python_novaclient_ext- rax_default_network_flags_python_novaclient_ext- ip_associations_python_novaclient_ext
